Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Seaside Resorts.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides [ICON_Tourism] Tourism equal to the tile's Appeal. Can only be built on Coastal Desert, Coastal Plains, or Coastal Grassland tiles. Minimum Appeal of Breathtaking.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Farms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food. Can only be built on Grassland or Plains.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Constructing farms adjacent to other Farms provides bonuses to Housing.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Mines.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. -1 Appeal. Can be built on hills or valid resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Luxury or Strategic resources, the city will gain use of that resource.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Quarries.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. -1 Appeal. Can only be built on valid resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on a Luxury resource, the city will gain use of that resource.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Fishing Boats.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food. Can only be built on valid resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Luxury resources, the city will gain use of that resource.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Pastures.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. Can only be built on valid resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Strategic resources, the city will gain use of that resource.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Plantations.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Can only be built on valid resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Luxury resources, the city will gain use of that resource.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Camps.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Can only be built on valid resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If built on Luxury resources, the city will gain use of that resource.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Lumber Mill.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production. +1 [ICON_Production] Production if adjacent to River. Can only be built on Woods.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct an Oil Well.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-1 Appeal. Can only be built on land tiles with[ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct an Offshore Oil Rig.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-1 Appeal. Can only be built on Coast or Lake tiles with [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil.
Occupying unit receives +4 [ICON_Strength] Defense Strength, and automatically gains 2 turns of fortification.
Unlocks the Military Engineer ability to construct an Airstrip.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can support 3 air units. Can only be built on flat terrain. -1 Appeal.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Château, unique to France.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold. +1 Appeal. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every adjacent wonder (becomes +2 after researching Flight). +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold if on a tile containing a River edge. Provides [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from [ICON_CULTURE] Culture after researching Flight. Must be placed adjacent to a Bonus or Luxury resource. Cannot be built adjacent to another Château.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Colossal Head.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Rainforest. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 2 adjacent Woods. Cannot be built on Snow or Snow Hills.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct the Great Wall, unique to China.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides an increase to [ICON_Strength] Defense. Bonus to [ICON_Gold] Gold if adjacent to other segments. Additional [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism as you advance through the Technology Tree for adjacent segments. Must be built in a line along the borders of your empire.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Kurgan, unique to Scythia.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each adjacent Pasture (becomes +2 after researching Stirrups). Provides [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from [ICON_FAITH] Faith after researching Flight. Cannot be built on Hills.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Mission, unique to Spain.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Additional +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science once Cultural Heritage is discovered. +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +1 [ICON_FOod] Food if on a different continent than your [ICON_Capital] Capital. +1 [ICON_Science] Science for every adjacent Campus and Holy Site district.

Unlocks the Roman Legion ability to construct a Roman Fort, unique to Rome.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Occupying unit receives +4 [ICON_Strength] Defense Strength, and automatically gains 2 turns of fortification.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Sphinx, unique to Egypt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +1 Appeal. +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith if next to a wonder. Cannot be built next to another Sphinx. Can be built on Floodplains.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Stepwell, unique to India.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith if adjacent to a Holy Site district. +1 [ICON_Food] Food if adjacent to a Farm. Additional [ICON_Housing] Housing, [ICON_Faith] Faith, and [ICON_Food] Food as you advance through the Technology and Civics Tree. Cannot be built on Hills or adjacent to another Stepwell.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Ziggurat, unique to Sumeria.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Science] Science. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if next to River. Cannot be built on Hills.
